section.title: Reading of main entities
section.para: The highest level element is the set, which can contain books or other sets.
A book can be divided into divisions, which can be further subdivided by components.

listitem.para: Components are the higher (chapter level) entities. These include articles, biographies, chapters, appendices, etc.
Some components such as the article can also be divisions, since they can contain other components.

section.para: Components can be further divided into sections, which can contain block elements (paragraphs, images, lists, etc) and inline elements (quotes, links, superscript, subscript, etc).
For the larger elements, we can also remember meta information (title, subtitle, titleabbrev, info, etc).
